short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Drag and drop bookmark manager, with floating folder windows and views

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
üê≤ "Dragon Bookmark Manager" is a free and open source chrome extension, for people who want an explorer-like bookmark manager, with floating menu windows and restorable views.

Features include:
‚úÖ Multi column floating menu windows for every folder with view layouts, you can save and restore.
‚úÖ Explorer-like select, cut, copy and paste, and drag and drop between windows.
‚úÖ Recently modified folders, in extension popup and manager for quick access to recently modified folders.
‚úÖ Tabs, history and every subfolder, can be independently searched.
‚úÖ Light and dark themes.
‚úÖ Free and open source code written in clojurescript, re-frame and reagent available at: https://github.com/mykeydoesotwork/dragon-bookmark-manager.
